noticeDescription:
A Bill for the benefitting property listed below has been submitted for the meeting of City Council being held on December 16 and 17, 2020. Review Bill details 

Each bill imposes a special charge on the corresponding benefitting property as a result of the property having entered into a Property Owner Agreement with the City and having undertaken energy efficiency and/or water conservation works as local improvements under the Residential Retrofit Program authorized by Executive Committee Item EX33.22, as adopted by Council on July 16, 17, 18 and 19, 2013 and enacted in By-law 1105-2013 (July 19, 2013).

The benefitting property is:

- 102 Bude Street

otherReferenceList.description: By-law 1105-2013 - To authorize the undertaking of energy efficiency and water conservation works on private residential property as local improvements under the Residential Retrofit Program
2013.EX33.22 - Proposed Energy and Water Efficiency Initiative for the Residential Sector

signedBy: John D. Elvidge, Interim City Clerk
title: Notice of the imposition of special charges on benefitting properties under the City's Residential Retrofit Program.
topics: Financial > Special charges for City's Residential Retrofit Program
